title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, April 24, 2015
description: Airing on Friday, April 24, 2015: First up, we'll talk with Marketplace's Molly Wood about the issues surrounding the Comcast merger. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, host Ben Johnson takes on Fred Benenson, data lead at Kickstarter and the creator of an all-emoji translation of Moby Dick, for an emoji-themed challenge.
